description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3p019","text":"Here, we describe performing co-immunoprecipitation experiments in HEK293 cells using GFP-trap beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"av21o","text":"See \"Protocol: HEK293 cell culture for co-immunoprecipitation experiments\" for preceding culture and transfection. For the present study, HEK cells were transfected with EGFP-tagged bait proteins. Prey proteins were either endogenous or transfected with HA- or SNAP-tags. \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4inrb","text":"Prepare wash buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6845c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6m68c","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dkl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v9bm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ak6nl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.5","10 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["EDTA","0.5 mM"],["Triton-X (optional)","0.4%"]],"guid":"DB760120274311EEB689711B3A7BA57B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.5","10 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["EDTA","0.5 mM"],["Triton-X (optional)","0.4%"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"77gls","text":"Triton-X should be included for prey proteins where appreciable non-specific binding is observed in the EGFP vector condition.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crhf7","text":"Prepare lysis buffer. Lysis buffer composition differed for experiments needing lambda phosphatase treatment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmj66","text":"Lysis buffer for non-lambda phosphatase experiment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmvj6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8i9np","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.5","10 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["EDTA","0.5 mM"],["NP-40","0.5%"],["PMSF","1 mM"],["TAME","0.01 mg/mL"],["Leupeptin","0.01 mg/mL"],["Pepstatin A","0.001 mg/mL"]],"guid":"806D9A30274411EEB689711B3A7BA57B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.5","10 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["EDTA","0.5 mM"],["NP-40","0.5%"],["PMSF","1 mM"],["TAME","0.01 mg/mL"],["Leupeptin","0.01 mg/mL"],["Pepstatin A","0.001 mg/mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hv64","text":"Lysis buffer compatible with lambda phosphatase experiment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a74cg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dan3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e67jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ippt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["1x NEBuffer for Protein MettaloPhosphatases (New England BioLabs)","1x"],["NP-40","0.5%"],["Leupeptin","0.01 mg/mL"],["ddH2O","To desired volume"]],"guid":"01031FC0274611EEB689711B3A7BA57B","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1x NEBuffer for Protein MettaloPhosphatases (New England BioLabs)","1x"],["NP-40","0.5%"],["Leupeptin","0.01 mg/mL"],["ddH2O","To desired volume"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqqmv","text":"24 hours after transfection, wash HEK cells twice in ice-cold PBS and lyse in appropriate lysis buffer. Use 600 µL lysis buffer per experimental condition (pooled across the three 10cm dishes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3q6ic","text":"Clarify lysates at 10 x g at 4 degrees C for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6a1s","text":"Wash 25 µL GFP-trap beads per experimental condition in 500 µL wash buffer, in low protein binding Eppendorf tubes under rotating agitation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rt9h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b96nn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ft6ko","text":"For large protein complexes, GFP-Trap Magnetic Particles M-270 should be used instead of GFP-Trap Magnetic Agarose beads","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"okmr","text":"Equilbrate beads in lysis buffer for 5 min at 4 degrees C under rotating agitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emll3","text":"Incubate beads with clarified lysate (or lambda phosphatase-treated lysate) for 1 hour at 4 degrees C under rotating agitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ad7vg","text":"For lambda phosphatase experiments: add 60 µL of 10 mM MnCl2 and 24 µL lambda phosphatase (2,400 units; New England BioLabs) for a final reaction volume of 600 µL per experimental condition. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":59,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c64jh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bss3u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":66,"style":"sub"}],"key":"1pfg","text":"For conditions that are lambda phosphatase-negative, add 24 µL ddH2O instead","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg2el","text":"Wash beads three times for 5 min in wash buffer at 4 degrees C under rotating agitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75nre","text":"Resuspend beads in 60 µL denaturing buffer, and boil for 10 minutes to release bound protein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Co-immunoprecipitation using GFP-trap
